name: NewArticleTemplates
author: Mathias Ertl
Fabian Zeindl
jmnote
description: Prefills newly created pages with some text.

NewArticleTemplatesDefault.description: Default template page title to preload (e.g., "Template:New page").

NewArticleTemplatesEnabledNamespaces.description: Namespace IDs where templates should be applied. If empty or unset, apply to all namespaces.

NewArticleTemplatesNamespaceTemplates.description: Map of namespace ID => template page title to preload.

NewArticleTemplatesApplyToSubpages.description: Whether to apply templates on subpages (default: true).
